### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Copper plate mine 
No copper plate mine has been constructed yet

### Chests at various positions
Consists of following entities
-  Chest at position(x=43.5, y=-82.5)
-  Chest at position(x=40.5, y=-80.5)
-  Chest at position(x=43.5, y=-81.5)
-  Chest at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)
-  Chest at position(x=0.5, y=2.5)
-  Chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Lab at position
Consists of lab at position with no input items

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into labs
-  Make sure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into labs
### Errors when extracting items from chests
-  Ensure the chest is not empty and contains the item you are trying to extract
-  Make sure the chest is a valid entity and is at the correct position
### Errors when setting research in labs
-  Ensure the lab is a valid entity and is at the correct position
-  Make sure the research technology is valid and available
### Errors when inserting items into entities
-  Ensure the entity can accept the item you are trying to insert
-  Make sure the entity is a valid entity and is at the correct position
### Errors with burner mining drills
-  Ensure the burner mining drill has enough fuel to operate
-  Make sure the burner mining drill is placed correctly and has a valid drop position
### Errors with offshore pumps and boilers
-  Ensure the offshore pump and boiler are connected correctly
-  Make sure the boiler has enough fuel to operate
### Errors with pipe groups
-  Ensure the pipe group is connected correctly and has a valid fluid system
-  Make sure the pipe group is not empty and has a valid fluid output
### Errors with electricity groups
-  Ensure the electricity group is connected correctly and has a valid voltage
-  Make sure the electricity group has a valid pole position
